title: The Cause & Effects Of The Cuban Embargo

media:group.media:title: The Cause & Effects Of The Cuban Embargo
media:group.media:description:
The cause of the Cuban Embargo explained, followed by analysis of its effects.

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
0:45 The Cause Of The Embargo
11:44 The Effects Of The Embargo
22:57 Why Do We Still Have The Embargo?
24:48 Outro

Sources:

Cuba: Between Reform And Revolution - Louis A. Pérez
Economic Sanctions As An Instrument Of U.S. Foreign Policy: The Case Of The U.S. Embargo Against Cuba - Helen Osieja
Six Crises - Richard M. Nixon
Cuba Under Embargo - Joe Atikian
Sanctions As Economic Statecraft - Steve Chan & A. Cooper Drury
The Economic Impact Of U.S. Sanctions With Respect To Cuba - U.S. International Trade Commission
The Impact Of The U.S. Embargo On Health & Nutrition In Cuba - The American Association For World Health
The Confluence Of Domestic And International Interests: U.S. Policy Towards Cuba, 1998-2001 - Philip Brenner, Patrick J. Haney & Walter Vanderbush

Links:
